body.content:
Advanced Micro Devices Inc. AMD recently announced that it has inked an agreement with Global Foundries to make some amendments to its already existing Wafer Supply Agreement (WSA).

The Agreement in Details

The agreement, in force from Jan 1, 2016 to Dec 31, 2020, delineates a collaborative framework between the two companies for manufacturing the 7nm node. With this announcement, Advanced Micro has positioned itself to manufacture certain products with the help of another foundry.

The agreement also elaborates on annual targets for wafer purchase as well as setting of prices from 2016 till the end of 2020.

Advanced Micro will make a total payment of $100 million in cash to Global Foundries following the new terms. The company will make the payment in installments beginning from the fourth quarter of 2016 to the end of the third quarter of 2017.

Moreover, Advanced Micro will make quarterly payments to Global Foundries starting from 2017 against certain wafers manufactured by a third party supplier.

Further, the agreement also entails (through a warrant) Mubadala, the parent company of Global Foundries to buy 75 million shares of Advanced Micro at $5.98 per share.

The warrant may be exercised in whole or in part prior to Feb 29, 2020. However, it limits Mubadalas beneficial ownership to 19.99% of Advanced Micros outstanding shares.

Due to the $100 million payment and warrant issue (worth $235 million), Advanced Micro expects to record a one-time accounting charge in the third quarter of 2016.

Our Take

We note that Advanced Micro Devices, being a fabless semiconductor company, is distributing its manufacturing load to multiple suppliers. This may be due to the supply chain concerns the company is facing over 14nm Polaris based graphics cards.

We believe that expansion of the supplier base will enable the company to lower costs and maintain a smooth supply chain.
ADV MICRO DEV Price | ADV MICRO DEV Quote

Zacks Rank & Stocks to Consider

At present, Advanced Micro has a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).

Some better-ranked stocks in the broader technology space are Alpha & Omega Semiconductor, Ltd. AOSL, Amkor Technology, Inc. AMKR and AXT Inc. AXTI, each sporting a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).

Confidential from Zacks

Beyond this Analyst Blog, would you like to see Zacks' best recommendations that are not available to the public? Our Executive VP, Steve Reitmeister, knows when key trades are about to be triggered and which of our experts has the hottest hand. Click to see them now>>

Want the latest recommendations from Zacks Investment Research? Today, you can download 7 Best Stocks for the Next 30 Days. Click to get this free report
 
ADV MICRO DEV (AMD): Free Stock Analysis Report
 
AMKOR TECH INC (AMKR): Free Stock Analysis Report
 
ALPHA&OMEGA SEM (AOSL): Free Stock Analysis Report
 
AXT INC (AXTI): Free Stock Analysis Report
 
To read this article on Zacks.com click here.
 
Zacks Investment Research

LISTID:JTD$politics.title: Angry protesters ready for Trump ahead of his Detroit visit
LISTID:JTD$politics.summary: Toni McIlwain believes that as a candidate for president, Donald Trump has a right to go anywhere he wants.  People picked up on Trump saying youre all just crap, said McIlwain, who for years ran a community center that offered education and drug prevention programs in one of Detroits most distressed
LISTID:JTD$politics.author: Corey Williams, Associated Press

topRatedComments.comment: All I ever hear is how blacks don?t want to be judged by the color of their skin-BUT THAT?S ALL THEY WANT TO TALK ABOUT. It?s funny how black people are just fine generalizing themselves when it comes to other things, like crying that blacks (generalizing) are treated unfairly because of the color of their skin (generalizing) and profiled by the police (when in fact more white people are killed by cops per year than any other again generalizing).  FYI lady black neighborhoods are plagued with violence, black on black crime is at an all-time high, but Trump is racist because he points that out and wants to try and help???.. these people (yup I'm generalizing) need to pull their heads out of their #$%$, a black man holds the highest honor in this country, we have black scholars, 95% of all NFL teams are black, the baseball team representing the USA in the Olympics 90% black I could go on and on AND REMEMBER blacks are only about 13% of the entire USA population. Maybe if blacks stopped thinking about being black they would get somewhere.

DO YOU THINK ANYONE ON WELFARE WILL VOTE FOR TRUMP? IS TRUMP GOING TO CONTINUE THEIR FREEBIES? DO YOU THINK THEY CARE ABOUT JOBS AND THE ECONOMY? WELFARE IS BETTER THAN MINIMUM WAGE. SO WHY WORK. HOW MANY MORE PEOPLE  ARE ON WELFARE THAN  8 YEARS AGO? AND WHO IS GOING TO PAY FOR THAT?
THAT IS A STATISTIC YOU NEVER HEAR ABOUT. 
THAT IS A LARGE VOTING BLOCK - DEMOCRAT
CONGRESSMEN SERVING 40 TO 50 YEARS.
THEY HAVE COMPLETE CONTROL OF THEIR PAY AND BENEFITS
OUR COUNTRY HAS LOST IT'S DIRECTION AND I DON'T SEE ANY WAY TO CHANGE IT.

Trump is right, the blacks are under employed, under educated and at the mercy of the Government, which is just the way the Democrats want it. Trump wants to help these people better themselves. He could say it a little more diplomatically than he has, but that is th truth. If Blacks vote for him, at least there is someone who will TRY to change things for the backs. Clinton just wants their Votes, after the election she will throw them out like an old newspaper used to wrap Fish

Liberals are the most hypocritical group of people I've ever met. They claim to respect others opinions, but when that opinion doesn't coincide with their own, it's all downhill from there. Trump is where he is is because of a record amount of votes he received to become the GOP nominee. How did Hillay become the DNC nomination? By rigging the system with the help of another woman...emails prove it. Liberals lack common sense. You'd think they'd realize how corrupt the media is, especially liberal media. If half the country wants Trump, and trump received a record number of votes in the primaries, what does that tell you? Liberal media constantly attacks him, and you idiots eat it all up. If someone is so blatantly biased, why would you believe every single thing that biased person says? Liberals = the real uneducated members of America. Love how under Obama all of my black friends from high school still live terrible lives and are still unemployed. You'd think after years of being held back the black community would stop voting for a party that has shown time and time again that they just use blacks for votes then throw them to the side. Pathetic.

Before posting, I read a lot of the other posters' comments and I am no surprised that they are mostly supporters of Donald Trump.
That's all well and good, but let's be honest and stick to the facts.
The opinions of these posters support the notion that black people in the inner cities are having to deal with the problems that are in inherent with low income, lack of decent housing, lower educational stats, and no real job creation because most black voters vote for democrats.
A majority of the Trump supporters are making the claim that because black people, in the majority, have always voted for democrats and that after the democrats get their votes, then they basically desert their black supporters and no promised policies are kept.
Researching data on what is factually found is that black people actually do better under democratic legislations and it has nothing to do with the  democrats giving out what some call 'free stuff', such as welfare and food.  I am offended and appalled at the lack of facts that Trump supporters use to support this outrageous claim.
There are currently 31 Republican Governors and the legislatures in these states are a majority republican-controlled state houses.
A lot of what is happening in the states is a direct result of how these legislators use their power to control who gets what.
Practically all of what is good for a decent living is directed to areas outside the city limits in the states where we have 31 Republican Governors and majority-republican legislators.  
Every one of these republican-controlled states this country, especially in the South, are dealing with a downgrade of every decent quality of life for inner-city dwellers.
Before you give your opinion on this topic, look up some of the facts that I have cited on what is happening to the inner-cities where we have overwhelmingly REPUBLICAN GOVERNORS AND LEGISLATURES, and if you are honest with yourself, you will see that inner-cities and minority populations actually have better qualities of life when Democrats lead the states.
It has become quite a challenge to deal with comments where no obvious research has been done before Trump supporters give their opinions on what they believe to be the truth.
As I have often heard, you are entitled to your own opinion, but remember, that without facts to support what you BELIEVE to be true, then it remains just that.......YOUR OWN OPINION.

LISTID:JTD$politics.title: 'This is our country!' says Chinese official as Obama lands
LISTID:JTD$politics.summary: When US President Barack Obama arrived in China Saturday for his final trip to Asia as commander in chief, the ceremonial niceties were marred by an undiplomatic shouting incident on the tarmac.  Chinese authorities have imposed extremely tight security precautions for the G20 summit, and not even US

topRatedComments.comment: China owns us and we are to blame. It is not like this in the rest of first world countries. We wanted cheap and now how do we go back to making our own products? The factories and the talent is gone. God help us if there is a war and China cuts us off - we won't even have a light bulb to see them coming. Of course that won't happen because they need our money to wage the war - we hope!

I got to stop clicking on these Click-bait Yahoo headlines. ""This is our country!" says Chinese official as Obama lands". What wasn't said, but you have to read to find out: Not what one would typically think of as an "official", probably just a Chinese TSA equivalent. Also, words not shouted to Obama, but to White House aid and there is probably more to the story than reported. You got me again Yahoo!

About time someone tell the Obama and the press pool that they are guests and in China, and that they do things differently in China. Arrogant behavior by the press pool and acting like they are entitled to behave like back the US sets a bad precedent. I foresee a day not too far off in the future where the Chinese military will not back down in the face of American military pressure... That will mark the day China is a true equal to the US...

Yes indeed, it is their country.  A country with each passing calendar day is on an inexorable path of overtaking USA in a number or realms, not the least of which world military dominance. Economic power, handed to communist China under Bill Clinton-era trade agreements will easily equate to military power.
And when does the big dog in China visit America?

LISTID:JTD$politics.title: Trump catches up to Clinton, latest Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
LISTID:JTD$politics.summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has pulled into an effective tie with Democratic rival Hillary Clinton, erasing a substantial deficit as he consolidated support among his partys likely voters in recent weeks, according to the latest Reuters/Ipsos national tracking poll released Friday
LISTID:JTD$politics.author: By Maurice Tamman and Chris Kahn

topRatedComments.comment: The media is going to make this a horse race regardless of what it takes.  These polls  (especially those sponsored by media organizations) have become worthless, and are simply tools of the media.

One thing to remember about polls. Over the last several years, the pronouncements and predictions coming from "polls" have been remarkably inaccurate. 

It is obvious however that the PRESS and what it tells us (we will euphemistically call it "news" or "reporting") using polls as the basis for informing us, is  journalistic filler. It suggests to me, when I hear statements, backed by conclusions drawn from the results of some poll,  that what follows is sure to be unsubstantiated and most likely B.S..

Read the post by Marion below. AMEN! Mario!

This is just another reason that voters should ignore most polls. Many are worthless and some are designed to influence rather that report. How can anyone believe a poll that polled only 1804 'likely voters'?

 A suggestion. Forget the polls. They are an exercise in futility for most voters. They confuse. They mislead. Check out each candidate and vote for the one that seems qualified. Do NOT allow anyone do your thinking for you.

Isn't it amazing. Suddenly The Donald has 'caught up' !?!  Whoever the pollsters were that wanted to diss The Donald just finally had to come clean? The Donald has NEVER BEEN BEHIND in the minds of those who helped get him the GOP Nom.
Is Clinton in the witness protection program? Where the heck is she?

LISTID:JTD$politics.title: Row on tarmac an awkward G20 start for U.S., China
LISTID:JTD$politics.summary: A Chinese official confronted U.S. President Barack Obamas national security adviser on the tarmac on Saturday prompting the Secret Service to intervene, an unusual altercation as China implements strict controls ahead of a big summit.  The stakes are high for China to pull off a trouble-free G20 summit

topRatedComments.comment: Had it occurred in California Rice would have sucker punched him or popped him with a shiv.
Not a story here, China has and always will do as they wish. Only story is that the Almighty Obama is not in control.
Obama needs to discuss North Korea issue and how to keep North Korea in its place. Or we will do it not to China 's  interest.

thank you to the nation of China for  the respect and courtesy extended to our President Obama,while he is on a diplomatic visit.I am sure there will dialogue that is not pleasant,yet he will not be rude to you. thank  you President Xi Jinping  for your courtesy.

exactly how Clinton handles the press here in America
why the concern over China?

LISTID:JTD$politics.title: Poll: Young adults divided on immigration, border control
LISTID:JTD$politics.summary: DES MOINES, Iowa (AP)  Young Hispanics, Asian-Americans and African-Americans are much more likely to trust Hillary Clinton than Donald Trump to deal with immigrants living in the United States illegally. But young whites tend to trust Trump more on issues related to illegal immigration, including securing
